## Overview

AccordionGroup element represents the wrapping element around a set of
Accordion element(s).

## Properties

| Property           | Attribute            | Description | Type      | Default |
| ------------------ | -------------------- | ----------- | --------- | ------- |
| `allowMultiExpand` | `allow-multi-expand` |             | `boolean` | `false` |
